name: Cylindrica
description:
Theme : Unlearn

Humans have already learnt enough to destroy the earth.
super-powerful AI has emerged, with disastrous consequences and destroying the life.
All the life on earth is destroyed by AI, except the small place called Cylindrica built and shielded by you.
The only way to save life on earth is to unlearn the technology and destroy it.

Developer : Ramesh Manne (BYOG 2019 finalist)
